articles.title: Soccer-Pochettino leaves open possibility of Messi debut at Brest
articles.description: There is a very good feeling." Messi had not trained for a month after steering Argentina to the Copa America title with a 1-0 win over rivals Brazil in the final. Having won 10 LaLiga and four Champions League titles during his 17-year career at Barcelona, Messi left them on a free transfer after the Catalan club's president Joan Laporta said they could no longer afford to keep him.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi may be in the Paris St Germain squad for their Ligue 1 visit to Brest on Friday, manager Mauricio Pochettino said but he remained tight-lipped on whether the six-times Ballon d'Or winner would finally make his debut.
The 34-year-old Mess... [1754 chars]

articles.title: Spotify brings Music + Talk audio format to more than a dozen countries
articles.description: Starting this week, Music + Talk is available in 15 new markets across Europe, Latin America and Asia: Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, France, Germany, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Philippines, Spain, and Sweden.
articles.content: The shows made using Music + Talk are available to both Premium and Free listeners. However, The shows made using Music + Talk are available to both Premium and Free listeners. However, Spotify Premium users will hear full tracks as part of these sho... [1096 chars]

articles.title: Tear-soaked tissue used by Lionel Messi during Barcelona farewell up for sale at $1 million
articles.description: In fact not only the 'original' tissue paper was put up for sale, but also replicas of it are currently being sold online in Argentina.
articles.content: The departure of Lionel Messi from Barcelona to Paris Saint Germain (PSG) shocked the football world and left fans just like the star emotional. Now, the tissue used by a tearful Messi during his farewell press conference in Barcelona earlier this mo... [2119 chars]

articles.title: Rugby-Bok coach says squad will get better with game-time after Argentina win
articles.description: South Africa coach Jacques Nienaber was pleased with his much-changed side in their 32-12 Rugby Championship victory over Argentina in Nelson Mandela Bay on Saturday, but said they need to work on their continuity after a scrappy encounter.

articles.title: Rugby-Changed Boks grind out Rugby Championship win over Argentina
articles.description: First half tries by scrumhalf Cobus Reinach and wing Aphelele Fassi led much-changed South Africa to a scrappy 32-12 victory over Argentina on their return to the Rugby Championship in Nelson Mandela Bay on Saturday.
